name: Flight Race Shooting Simulator
description:
Feel the thrill of Plane Flying & Shooting like never before in this action-packed, heart-thumping air plane war shooting game.

Fly your plane at insane speeds through ever changing obstacles.
Your reflexes will mean the difference between surviving or crashing in spectacular fashion.

Do you have what it takes to reach farthest?

FEATURES
* Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt/joystick controls.
* Different Power-ups.
* Different Worlds to cross.
* Defeat the boss to reach the next level.
* Eye popping high definition 3D graphics.
* Environments that keeps changing.
* Awesome realistic sound effects.
